poemsDataJson.list_full: このたびは ぬさもとりあへず 手向山(たむけやま) 紅葉(もみぢ)の錦(にしき) 神(かみ)のまにまに
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: At the present time,//Since I could bring no offering,//See Mount Tamuke!//Here are brocades of red leaves,//As a tribute to the gods.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Kono tabi wa|Nusa mo toriaezu|Tamuke-yama|Momiji no nishiki|Kami no mani mani
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: もみちのにしき かみのまにまに
poemsDataJson.author: 菅家(かんけ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 手向山の紅葉を幣としてささげること
